name: Auto Collections Random Collections
overview: Randomly displays collections on the Jellyfin home screen
description: Adds random collections to your home screen each time it loads, helping you rediscover content in your library. Works with the HomeScreenSections plugin to dynamically display a configurable number of random collections.

versions.changelog:
- Initial release
- Random collection selection for home screen
- Configurable number of collections (1-20)
- Per-user caching to reduce frequent changes
- Smart refresh on server restart and page reload
